Registro de altera√ß√µes 4.5.0:
‚Ä¢ Melhor performance do aplicativo
(a performance √© 7% mais r√°pida que a atualiza√ß√£o anterior)

‚Ä¢ Fix Airborne Radar SRC PD HDN duplicate title

‚Ä¢ Navigation tabs: Change animation mode to Linear and made the tab strip fullWidth, adjust height

‚Ä¢ Navigation tabs: adjust scrolling behavior. (introduce parallax scrolling, show tabs when you navigate up)

‚Ä¢ Improved theme dialog (it is now themed with the rest of the app, text is now visible and customized the font)

‚Ä¢ Theme Dialog: Fixed wrong title text

‚Ä¢ Fixed a rare potential crash when launching the Easter Egg, but then navigating back before it launches

‚Ä¢ Settings: show a warning if the user tries to set the (already) applied theme

‚Ä¢ Don't hide the SystemUI (status bar and navigation bar) in the Home Fragment

‚Ä¢ Fix Dynamic Theming, the blue header image is now replaced by your system color

‚Ä¢ About: Slightly redesigned the features and plans button

‚Ä¢ About: Added some transparency to Developer image and social buttons

‚Ä¢ About: hide the navigation bar, improve the gradient, reduce gradient animation time, set new margins for the upcoming features button now that the bottom nav bar isnt in the way

‚Ä¢ Add logging to retrieve the users Theme choice. Trying to see what is most popular

‚Ä¢ Updated some android libraries and AGP


Previous update:

‚Ä¢ NEW! Airborne Radar section

‚Ä¢ New Themes UI

‚Ä¢ Added back AMOLED theme

‚Ä¢ Added some vibrations for some app elements

‚Ä¢ Fixed a crash when navigating back from a webpage

‚Ä¢ Added Portuguese-Brazilian translations (Thanks viispy on Discord)

‚Ä¢ Notification permission pops up on Home instead of app launch

‚Ä¢ Adjusted "Dark Red" theme

‚Ä¢ Redesigned the Bottom Navigation View

‚Ä¢ Redesigned vehicle group tab

‚Ä¢ Bottom Bar now hides when reading about vehicle
